title: Stars Stuck At Home
description:
Celebrities are just like us… and right now they’re going a little stir-crazy. A conversation featuring Nikki’s friend, Ross Mathews.

Follow Ross Mathews on Instagram and Twitter.

Tell us what’s making you smile! Send a voice memo to smile@wondery.com 

Our theme song is “Smile” by Ryan Innes

---
